pullRequest.title: CB-7147 - [ASRG] Refactor termination resource collection
pullRequest.bodyText:
Contains the following 2 commits:
CB-6584 - [ASRG] Termination - refactor downscale code
CB-7147 - [ASRG] Refactor termination resource collection and E2E test

nodes.bodyText: This part could maybe go into AzureUtils or even AzureClient as findNetworkInterfacesByName
I would move this to a separate method
An Observable comes back from the Collection deletion, that is, one String in exchange for a collection of Strings. What is the output of the log line, what is disk?
If possible, I would get rid of the double negation.
This part could go into AzureUtils.
StartDatabaseServer and StopDatabaseServer are identical to the base implementation (NotImplemented), can be deleted.
